Key Match Events: Riyan Parag reeled off the last two wickets off the first two balls of the last over
Sri Lanka collapsed from 140/1 to 163/7 in three overs
India won by 43 runs after Sri Lanka's collapse
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elected to bowl after winning the toss
Key players like Nissanka and Parag were pivotal in the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under clear blue skies in Pallekele
Sri Lanka's required rate was over 11, but they couldn't chase down the target
Misfields and poor decision-making by India contributed to Sri Lanka's collapse
Others: This was a significant win for India in the context of their World Champions status
The match highlighted the resilience and ability of India to recover in high-pressure situations
